attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: criminals should have more of an incentive to stick to the laws as they were made for a reason and if they are broken they should have serious punishments

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/JudcialReview/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
